Uses of Class
btrplace.solver.choco.transition.VMTransitionBuilder

  • Packages that use VMTransitionBuilder 
    Package Description
    btrplace.solver.choco.transition
    Different classes to model the possible state transitions for a VM or a node.

    • Uses of VMTransitionBuilder in btrplace.solver.choco.transition

      Subclasses of VMTransitionBuilder in btrplace.solver.choco.transition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BootVM.Builder
      The builder devoted to a ready->running transition.
      static class  ForgeVM.Builder
      The builder devoted to a init->ready transition.
      static class  KillVM.Builder
      The builder devoted to a (init|ready|running|sleep)->killed transition.
      static class  RelocatableVM.Builder
      The builder devoted to a running->running transition.
      static class  ResumeVM.Builder
      The builder devoted to a sleeping->running transition.
      static class  ShutdownVM.Builder
      The builder devoted to a running->ready transition.
      static class  StayAwayVM.BuilderReady
      The builder devoted to a ready->ready transition.
      static class  StayAwayVM.BuilderSleeping
      The builder devoted to a sleeping->sleeping transition.
      static class  SuspendVM.Builder
      The builder devoted to a running->sleeping transition.
      Methods in btrplace.solver.choco.transition that return types with arguments of type VMTransitionBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<VMTransitionBuilder> TransitionFactory.getBuilder(VMState srcState, VMState dstState)
      Get the model builder for a given transition
      Methods in btrplace.solver.choco.transition with parameters of type VMTransitionBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TransitionFactory.add(VMTransitionBuilder b)
      Add a builder for a VM
      boolean TransitionFactory.remove(VMTransitionBuilder b)
      Remove a builder for an action on a VM.
